@import "../../css/aoc.less"

# Test input

```elm {r}
testInput : List String
testInput =
    """mask = XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX1XXXX0X
mem[8] = 11
mem[7] = 101
mem[8] = 0"""
        |> String.lines
        |> List.map String.trim


testInput2 : List String
testInput2 =
    """mask = 000000000000000000000000000000X1001X
mem[42] = 100
mask = 00000000000000000000000000000000X0XX
mem[26] = 1"""
        |> String.lines
        |> List.map String.trim
```
